college.name: Institute of Advanced Technology
college.shortDescription: Premier institution for technology and innovation education
college.longDescription: Founded in 1995, the Institute of Advanced Technology has been at the forefront of technical education, providing cutting-edge programs in computer science, engineering, and information technology. Our institution is committed to fostering innovation, research, and industry collaboration.
college.mission: To empower students through excellence in technical education, research, and innovation while fostering ethical leadership and social responsibility.
college.vision: To be a globally recognized center of excellence in technology education that transforms lives and drives innovation.

faculty.name: Dr. Sarah Chen
faculty.bio: Dr. Chen specializes in Artificial Intelligence and Machine Learning with over 15 years of academic and industry experience. She has published numerous research papers in top-tier conferences.

faculty.name: Prof. Michael Rodriguez
faculty.bio: Expert in renewable energy systems and power electronics. Leads multiple government-funded research projects on sustainable energy solutions.

events.title: Annual Tech Symposium 2024
events.description: Join us for our flagship technology conference featuring industry leaders, workshops, and student project demonstrations.

events.title: Admissions Open House
events.description: Prospective students and parents are invited to tour our campus, meet faculty, and learn about our programs.

gallery.title: Best Engineering College Award 2023
gallery.description: Recognized for excellence in engineering education and infrastructure

gallery.title: Campus Innovation Center
gallery.description: New state-of-the-art innovation and research facility

courses.name: Computer Science and Engineering
courses.description: Comprehensive program covering software engineering, algorithms, AI, and system design. Prepares students for careers in technology and innovation.

courses.name: Electrical and Electronics Engineering
courses.description: Focuses on electrical systems, electronics, power generation, and renewable energy technologies with hands-on laboratory experience.
